enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding a child node to an element, with similar state changes in the element's child nodes.
Both methods involve inserting child nodes into an element, with similar input patterns of child nodes and insertion points.
After appending a child element, the children() method can be used to verify the updated list of child elements.
Both methods affect the size of the child nodes list, and childNodeSize() can be used to assert the expected size after appending.
